text:
[Verse]
Moonlight on the city
Feet are moving swiftly
Stars above are shining
In the night we're diving

[Verse 2]
Echoes of the laughter
No worries till after
Heartbeat like a rhythm
Feel the music with them

[Chorus]
Dance dance dance tonight
Underneath the city lights
Move move until the dawn
All our troubles are gone

[Verse 3]
Air is getting heavy
Everybody ready
Neon lights are glowing
Night is just beginning

[Verse 4]
Lost in the sensation
Join the celebration
Party till the sunrise
See the energy rise

[Chorus]
Dance dance dance tonight
Underneath the city lights
Move move until the dawn
All our troubles are gone
title: Midnight Dance
